<< msgbox gui module questdlg >>

qt_verbose

show/hide Qt debug message.

Syntax

r = qt_verbose()
p = qt_verbose(logical)

Input argument

logical

a logical: true to show messages, false to hide.

Output argument

r

logical: current value

p

logical: previous value

Description

qt_verbose how/hide Qt debug message.

This function is usefull to debug Qt and Qml.

Example

h = qt_verbose()

See also

qml_loadfile.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
